mapper.update: update db_config set 'NAME' = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, 'DESC' = #{desc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SID, 'NAME', OPER, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, 'DESC' from db_config
